short_summary: Acquisition of IT cabinets for Severs Rooms
description: Acquisition of IT cabinets for Severs Rooms, as well as installation of the acquired equipment.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement 
#### Solicitation Number: W6369-24DE13
#### Publication Date: 2023-09-25

This solicitation is made on behalf of the Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3. The procurement is subject to [list corresponding trade agreements, e.g., Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, etc.].

The contract is for the procurement of electrical components and equipment, and computer rack components. These items are expected to be delivered to the client in *[regions of delivery] (Kingston)*.

**Description:** The Director of Electronic Systems Procurement 3 is seeking to acquire IT cabinets, for server rooms, as well as the installation of equipment. Bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in the solicitation documentation, which can be downloaded from [insert link].

**Tender Status:** The tender is scheduled to close on *[tender closing date] (2023-10-05T14:00:00)*.

### Important Details

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: CKFTA, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Regions of Opportunity/Delivery: Kingston

### Contact Information

The contracting entity can be contacted at:

60 Moodie Dr
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
(343) 596-7090 (phone)
MAT.DESProc.3-4.DOSE@forces.gc.ca (email)

Queries may also be directed to Juan Saenz at the same contact information above.

For more information, please visit the [insert notice URL]. 
You may also download the solicitation documents from the following links: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8868/w6369-24de13-npp-%28eng.pdf&
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8868/w6369-24de13-qa-%28en.pdf.

After words we need to format output so that people can clearly see the most important details of the government tender. 
What do you think?

Issue solved, but the response rate was very good.
